General.Name: Penpower Technology Ltd
General.Description: Penpower Technology LTD. develops and sells devices with built-in intelligent human-machine interface technologies in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides handheld pen scanners and translators, pen scanners and translators for computers, and multilingual dictionary pens; wireless writing pads; embedded memory and digital memo writing pads; rechargeable touch screen stylus; and business card management, voice, graphic design, and document management solutions. It also offers electronic signature solutions, as well as software services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 47, Guangfu Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
